##7/12

##load
whiteprev <- read_csv("white_prevalence_state.csv")
blackprev <- read_csv("black_prevalence_state.csv")

##filter
whiteprevnc <- filter(whiteprev, state == "NORTH CAROLINA")
blackprevnc <- filter(blackprev, state == "NORTH CAROLINA")

##bind rows together
blackwhiteprev <- bind_rows(blackprevnc, whiteprevnc)

##graph
ggplot(data = blackwhiteprev, aes(x = primary_race, y = analysis_value)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", fill="steelblue") + ggtitle("Percentage of Diabetic North Carolinian Medicare Recipients by Race") + xlab("Race") + ylab("Percentage") + geom_text(aes(label=analysis_value), vjust=1.6, color="black")

##number of nc counties urban and rural
